title: 1926 6th Ave, Charming One + Bedroom w/ Hardwood Floors, Ivy Hill
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.
If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.
The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.
1926 6th Ave, Charming One Bedroom Plus Office w/ Hardwood Floors, Ivy Hill , $1,895.00
For an Appointment to View, please contact:
One Cat Allowed (Additional deposit of $300.00 and photo of the cat required);
We are offering a one-bedroom with office unit in the Ivy Hill area above Lake Merritt.
The unit features Hardwood Floors in living room, lots of windows in a great old 1920’s, well maintained building.
The bathroom features an old fashioned & charming bathtub with shower.
The great location, centered in the Lake Merritt area, means you will never be far from Lakeshore’s unique shopping and restaurants.
The building location offers easy access to the 580 freeway.
Hardwood Floors in Living room and Office
Cross streets are 6th Ave & E 19th St.
Walking distance to Grand Lake and Lakeshore shops, restaurants, coffee houses, bars, theater, Saturday Farmer's Market and transportation
Just a few blocks to Lake Merritt!
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13
Close to Downtown and Jack London Square
Approximately 1.4 miles to Lake Merritt BART
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
For applications or to view more listings, please visit our website by copying and pasting this link into your browsers address bar   <URL>
